1.2.name: wordpress/website-rank-tracker
1.2.description:
Tracks keywords and your website's rank for each in Google. You can choose to show the summary report as a dashboard widget. Dashboard widget options include: "Do not show", "Show all", or "Show only ranked keywords"

  • Many more features coming soon.

Installation is simple. Get your API Key from http://www.WebsiteRankTracker.com in just a few minutes.
